name: Curve25519.Signing.PrivateKey
desc: A Curve25519 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a random Curve25519 private key for signing.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a Curve25519 private key for signing from a data representation.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The raw representation of the key as a collection of contiguous bytes.

items.name: func signature<D>(for: D) -> Data
items.desc: Generates an EdDSA signature over Curve25519.
